description.narrative: Throughout 2017, the humanitarian situation in DRC has deteriorated. The Kasai region has experienced high level of violence leading to massive population movements and displacement. The rest of the country, including the Easter regions of N and S Kivu have also witnessed renewed high levels of violence and security issues. Â In 2017, BRC contributed GBP 200K to the ICRC country appeal for DRC to support the additional response work and office set up in the Kasai region. IFRC launched an emergency appeal in January 2018 to implement a complementary response primarily focusing on WASH in districts surrounding the areas where most of the violence was occurring. BRC has decided in April 2018, following a review of the Emergency Plan of Action, to support the appeal by pledging CHF 100K.
